array.string: Bonjour! I am Yuri, a simple farmer from Amiens.
I live in peace and harmony among my family and friends and everything is...
Mon Dieu! We are under attack by forces unknown. Quick, to the walls! Grab my bow on the way!
Help me get rid of these invaders. Tap or press the screen to strike them with my arrows!
I hope you spent a few points in the skill tree. I think I am going to need it!
Use the buttons below to activate my powers. Quick, let's defend the city!
That skeleton is taunting me. I will teach him a lesson...
They are tougher than the peasants, but I heard the dead are weary of fire... Time to put it to the test!
Using the powers drains my mana. If I'm out of mana, I can't do magic
Thank god it replenishes over time!
The woodcutter, builders and masons don't want to lose their homes either!
They want to help me with arrows and the walls. But for a price, as always. Damned unions...
Use the buttons below to buy arrows or repair the wall
Sacrebleu! A dragon, in the winter? Dragons hate cold, everyone knows that... They must be desperate
The Fire elementals also despise the cold but I doubt they will stop coming
And they keep taunting me, these wraiths.
Kill them! kill them with fire! They burn like trees
If I ask the masons to build a moat, the attackers will take some damage every time they get close to the wall
And if I upgrade it with underwater spikes, they may even instantly die before they reach us!
That skill tree is really awesome
I can try different options everytime I need
Maybe it should not, but it is so much fun this way!
Where did they all come from?
I bet they are coming all at once now...
